articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft's first AI PCs are the Surface Pro 10 and Surface Laptop 6 for businesses - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft kicks off its year of AI PCs with new Surface hardware for businesses. The Surface Pro 10 and Surface Laptop 6 will start shipping in April.
articles.content:
Microsofts first AI PCs are the Surface Pro 10 and Surface Laptop 6 for businesses
